Name: Grand Passion
Ingredients: 60 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Cut passion fruit in half and scoop out flesh into shaker. Add other ingredients. SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Are you lacking passion in your life? There's plenty in this fruity little number.
